column3: ACK f07fb5a55e2d5d87f288c988a24ae8b9e3f827a1\nGiven that this solves the underlying problem I prefer this to #19751, in the meantime until it's fixed upstream, so that we can have PowerPC builds for 0.21 with minimal change to the build.
